snippet: A hospital employee and seven others were indicted on Friday on charges of stealing the personal information of as many as 12,000 patients.
abstract: Monique Walker and seven other employees of Montegiore Medical Center are indicted for stealing personal information of patients; prosecutors have charged Walker with printing patients' records between 2012 and 2013 on nearly daily basis to sell to identity thieves.
lead_paragraph: A hospital employee and seven others were indicted on Friday on charges of stealing the personal information of as many as 12,000 patients.

headline.main: 8 Indicted in Identity Thefts of Patients at Montefiore Medical Center
headline.print_headline: 8 Indicted in ID Thefts of Patients at Hospital
